name: Jungle Sniper: Animal Shooting
description:
Welcome to the latest animal hunting game in jungle safari with all the new levels and realistic animated killing experience with sniper. Hunt for real animals in Hunting Safari now! Shoot at dangerous crazy animals. Unleash skills for shooting as sniper shooter. Don't let the deer escape. Return to the wilderness in the most visually stunning FPS hunting simulator on App Store!
Enjoy the biggest unique shooting and hunting “Animal Hunter Sniper Shooting” 3D game of 2018. Become a deadly sharp hunter; enter to the dark forest to hunt or kill the huge safari animals with test your best sniper skills and show your real assassination experience. Aim, Shoot and Kill, be the perfect hunter in “Animal Sniper” game, use your modern deadly sniper rifles and firearm to take the exciting shot, this wonderful sniper weaponries are especially designed to best handgun with a specially controlling zoom, unlimited ammo with powerful pierce bullets. You are equipped with many weapons like sniper gunfire. Use suitable handgun according to the situation. Prove That, You have the best hunter and show sniper abilities to shoot down the safari animals.
This game is a brand new real hunting and sniper shooting experience. Those who cannot risk their life hunting wild animals can enjoy real hunting simulation experience by playing this 3D game. While stag or reindeer run away hearing firing sound. The target of sniping running animals is a little challenging. So use your army sniper shooting skills to kill these animals before they attack or run away.
FEATURES
- An ultimate hunting action.
- Gameplay is simple yet entertaining.
- Efficient sniper gun control.
- True to life hunting experience.
- High fidelity cool graphics.
• Dangerous yet beautiful environment Full of wild animals.
• Variety of Animals to Kill.
• Best 3D Forest environment.
• Shooting from a vantage point.
• Shoot through Tree leaves.
• Aim at Running Wild Animals.
• Immersive 3D graphics.
• Each animal can be killed with two bullets at least.
